## `lapop` R package

I am the creator and manager of the `lapop` R package, which automates the process of creating a variety of graphs using LAPOP data and formatting standards. 

**Links:** [Source Code](https://github.com/lapop-central/lapop-viz)

## LAPOP Data Playground

I am the current manager of LAPOP's Data Playground, an interactive data visualization tool created in Tableau.  

**Links:** [Data Playground](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/lapop.central/viz/LAPOPV3_2/Combination?publish=yes) | [Source Code](https://github.com/vanderbilt-data-science/lapop-dashboard/tree/remove-label-numbers)
